ygData.subject: Re: Heritrix Frontier

Hello Gordon,

I am working on a customization of Heritrix and I need exa=
ctly those two features. However, I could not find any information on how t=
o use them. Could you please explain in more detail (or point me to the doc=
umentation) how to assign priorities to different queues while running a jo=
b and how to assign priorities to URIs when they are inserted into the queu=
es.

Thanks in advance.


> If you want your prioritization to also take ef=
fect within the standard 
> Heritrix frontier queues, there's a (seldom-use=
d) pair of features, 
> queue and URI 'precedence' values, which affect (1)=
 how inactive queues 
> are sorted while waiting for their chance to be act=
ive; (2) where URIs 
> are inserted into individual queues (if all the othe=
r factors which 
> affect whether they are pushed-near-the-top or queued-to=
-the-back are 
> equal).
>
